newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Cenbank bond rate rises to 2.635 pct.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Cenbank bond rate rises to 2.635 pct.

text.p: Brazil's benchmark overnight rate rose to 2.635 percent a month from 2.5737 percent last week at today's sale of 6.287 billion reais of 56-day Central Bank Bonds (BBC), dealers said.
The auction's result was in line with market expectations, they added.
The 56-day bonds mature March 12. Today's auction is expected to add 213 million reais to the banking system, with 6.5 billion reais in old bonds coming due Wednesday.
